mapper.select: SELECT T002.employeeNo, concat(T001.employeeFristName,T001.employeeLastName) as employeeName, right(T002.birthday,4) as birthday, T002.stayPeriod, T002.passportStayPeriod, T002.contractDeadline, T002.dealDistinctioCode FROM T002EmployeeDetail as T002 left join T001Employee as T001 on T002.employeeNo = T001.employeeNo where left(T002.employeeNo,2) != "BP" order by dealDistinctioCode,employeeNo ;
